attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
dissolving parliament now, before it is too late would possibly save tremendous civil unrest & bloodshed.

It has become increasingly obvious in recent years that the present party political system is completely obsolete, & was only ever, at best, an interim solution.

This could, & should have been clearly seen when Bismark founded the extremely introvert Party, which became the perfect tool/medium for the psychologically challenged (Col.) Hitler.

We now have a golden opportunity for a new beginning, we should not waste it!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
